name: Lost In RGB
description:
Made for Mini Jam 62: Colors

You play as [REDACTED], a sentient paint-bucket lost in a world of grey. Travel onward and harness different colors to reach RGB heaven (Although this is a demo so good luck with that).

This is the first game I've ever made, so comment any issues that arise. This was also created in pygame, so performance may be an issue for some computers. However enjoy the game! It was a blast to work on.
